text: "Boom Clap" is an electropop song by Charli XCX. This song was released as the first single from The Fault in Our Stars soundtrack. It was also on XCX's studio album Sucker. The single was released on June 15, 2014. It peaked at #6 on the UK Singles chart. It was also #8 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. It got positive reviews by music critics. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:2014 songs Category:Charli XCX songs
title: Boom Clap
